Articles.Content:
Is there a mod where I can control a trailer and truck as one vessel without actually connecting them to still have the trailer act like an actual trailer. Like Some wiring connections like real life semi trucks have. I want to be able to control the wheels to be able to turn and also help push the truck just like real life heavy equipment hauling for heavy and long loads. 

Edited October 30, 2018 by max17

34 minutes ago, max17 said:

Is there a mod where I can control a trailer and truck as one vessel without actually connecting them to still have the trailer act like an actual trailer.

Un-modded?  Either create yourself a physical hitch-and-latch system, and latch your trailer to your truck; or get creative with the Claw (in free pivot mode) and use that as your hitch/latch (just drop the trailer on top of it).

Modded -- erm.. I think there may be some mods that add 'trailer hitch' setups.  Feline rover (by @Nils277 ), perhaps some of the MKS rovers as well.  Also KIS winches might be used for this in one fashion or another.
